name: Naturalli UNSALTED ALMOND BUTTER CRUNCHY 360GM
product_detail: Almond butter is made from ground, roasted almonds, which are the seeds of the Prunus dulcis tree. The trees grow pink or white flowers and bear fruit. Almonds are the stone-like pits in the centers of the fruits.  Almonds have a long history as a healthy snack and are mentioned in ancient texts, including the Bible. The trees grow in many countries, such as Spain, Portugal, Italy, and the United States. In the United States, California is the only state that grows almonds.   Almond butter can be used in sandwiches, spreads, and many sweet and savory recipes. It can also be used as a dip for fresh fruits and vegetables.  Health Benefits  Since almond butter is made from ground almonds, it has many of the same health benefits as whole almonds. Although almond butter is high in calories, it is rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that are important for your health.  Some of the health benefits of almond butter include:  Heart Disease Prevention  Almond butter is high in monounsaturated fats. Monounsaturated fats help to lower LDL (“bad”) cholesterol and raise HDL (“good”) cholesterol.   Many other nutrients in almond butter also help improve your heart health and lower your risk for heart disease. 0mega-3 fatty acids help prevent irregular heart rhythms. Vitamin E may help stop plaque buildup in your arteries. L-arginine can help improve the health of the walls in your arteries.  Bone Health  Almond butter contains 60 milligrams of calcium or 5% of your recommended daily allowance. Calcium is important for the health of your bones. The magnesium in almond butter also helps your body absorb calcium better.  Blood Sugar Control  Almonds can help control blood sugar and insulin levels after eating. The magnesium in almond butter can also help increase insulin sensitivity. This could help lower your risk of developing diabetes.   Lower Risk of Some Conditions  Almond butter has more vitamin E than many other nut butters. Vitamin E is an antioxidant that could help prevent diabetes, obesity, and certain cancers. Almond butter also has antioxidant compounds such as flavonoids and polyphenols.                   Nutrition  Almond butter is rich in vitamin E and contains about 26% of your recommended daily allowance in a single serving. Vitamin E can help boost your immune system. Almond butter also contains 0mega-3 fatty acids, plant sterols, and L-arginine.   0mega-3 fatty acids are essential fats that your body needs but can’t make on its own. They play a vital role in your brain and eye health. Plant sterols help keep cholesterol from being absorbed into your bloodstream. L-arginine plays many important roles in your body, such as helping wounds heal, helping your kidneys flush out waste, and relaxing blood vessels to improve circulation.  Like other nut butters, almond butter contains a lot of healthy, unsaturated fat and a small amount of saturated fat.  The creamy spread also contains many vitamins and minerals, such as:  •             Potassium  •             Calcium  •             Manganese  •             Magnesium  •             Iron  •             Vitamin E  Nutrients per Serving  1 tablespoon of plain, unsalted almond butter (16 grams) contains:  •             Calories: 98   •             Protein: 3.4 grams  •             Fat: 9 grams  •             Carbohydrates: 3 grams  •             Fiber: 1.6 grams  •             Sugar: 0.7 grams  Almonds (and almond butter) are also high in oxalates. If you have a history of kidney stones, or you’re at risk of developing them, you should avoid almond butter or limit how much you eat.  How to Prepare Almond Butter  You can find almond butter in most grocery stores, typically where you find peanut butter and other nut butter spreads. Many brands of almond butter contain only ground, roasted almonds. Some brands contain added salt or sugar for flavor. Some “no-stir” varieties of almond butter have added oil in them, which keeps the almond butter from separating and makes the texture smoother and more spreadable.

name: Willynur Spices Organic Prekesee Willynur Spices
product_detail: INTRODUCTIONPrekese is a local Ghana name which refers to Tetrapleura tetraptera. It is an indigenous West Tropical Africa belonging to the family fabaceae. The plant can grow up to 20-25 metres tall. When fruits are matured, they turn brown and fall off. It is then dried before use. The fruit has a pungent aromatic odour attracting it as a key species in soup, stews as a herbal medicine, among others. Its usage is facilitated by its rich nutrients source such as lipids, protein, sugars, vitamins, phosphorus, potassium, magnesium, phosphorus, iron, zinc, sodium, copper, calcium, and antioxidants. Studies has proven that, the seeds, whole fruits and pulps of T. tetraptera comprises of varying degree of concentrations of vitamins and trace elements (iron, copper, manganese, cobalt, selenium, and zinc). It is not surprising that it is utilized in herbal medicine in African countries such as Ghana, Uganda and Nigeria.  EIGHT BENEFITS FOR CONSUMING T. TETRAPTERA Several health benefits are associated with the consumption of T. tetraptera. However, eight of the importance of the usage T. tetraptera are outline below.  WEIGHT LOSSPrekese can be prepared as tea which is used for reduction in weight. In addition, the Prekese drink has the ability to cleanse the extra fats in our bodies. FEVER AND ENEMA A person recovering from a medical condition is often asked to put the fruit in water and bath with it, this gives fast relief from feverish conditions. Similar guide also helps people suffering from constipation, enema, and emetic. DIABETES An investigation on rats demonstrated that T. tetraptera contributes to controlling type 2 diabetes mellitus. Additionally, T. tetraptera fruit extract was beneficial in lowering blood glucose levels in both fasting and non-fasting conditions. Basically, it is used in Nigeria for the treatment of these situations as a folkloric medicine. GASTROINTESTINAL DISORDERS The liquid from the fruit is mostly used traditionally to heal complications such as diarrhoea, vomiting or stomach pain. The presence of phytochemicals is known to fight against gastrointestinal-related ailments. HYPERTENSION The number of people living with hypertension and high blood pressure is predicted to be 1.56 billion worldwide by 2025.The alarming rate of this condition is partly attributed to lifestyle and dietary factors. This ranges from physical inactivity, alcohol consumption and tobacco use, and foods containing high levels of sodium resulting from processed and fatty foods. T. tetraptera has been identified as a powerful medicinal plant for curing blood pressure. CONVULSION MANAGEMENT In conventional medicine, herbal mixture out of ingredients including stem, fruit, and leaves has a positive effect on treating convulsions. A survey by University of KwaZulu-Natal revealed that the aqueous extract (liquid) of the fruit encompasses anticonvulsant properties which is useful for epilepsy management and control among patients. Thus,  slowing down the nervous system. MOSQUITO REPELLENTThe fruit has an indestructible smell, due to which it is often used as a mosquito repellent and is effective too. This property is attributed to the presence of essential oils. POSTPARTUM CARE Edeminang pod is used as a supplement in the soup served to postpartum mothers to avoid contraction. The pods are rich in potassium, iron, and calcium, the three major ingredients required for postpartum women. The soup also helps produce milk in new mothers and helps to restore the lost blood. PREPARATION OF HEALTHY PREKESE JUICEEquipment                                                            SieveCooking potIngredients3 medium-sized prekeseFresh gingerLemon juice (optional)WaterHoney (optional)InstructionsWash the prekese thoroughly, bruise it and break it into small piecesPour water into a cooking pot and boil it over high heat.Soak the pieces of prekese in the warm water and cover them with a lid for at least 30 minutes and at most one hour. The longer it soaks, the more it releases all the juice and flavour from its pods.Squeeze juice out of the lemon, wash ginger and crush it.Add the lemon juice and crushed ginger to the soaked prekese and mix thoroughly.Leave it for about 30 minutes. This helps the ginger to infuse well in the juice.Strain the mixture through a fine sieve to remove the ginger stalk.Add honey to taste and stir properly until it dissolves.Pour the juice into a bowl or bottle and preferably place it in the fridge to chill.You can serve chilled or while hot.ConclusionT. tetraptera continues to provide many health benefits to many rural people through their foods and drinks. A section of them have adopted its juice as a normal breakfast tea in their various homes. However, its preparation, concentrations and quantities to be used remains unknown to many. This call for research to further deepen our understanding of this limited information. Hopefully, entrepreneurs could add value and take prekese drink to the next level and to enter the international market.

name: U Organics Kenya Acacia seeds
product_detail: Benefits of AcaciaBeneficial for teeth and oral health-Acacia gum is used daily for oral hygiene. Its antimicrobial properties eliminate bacteria present in the mouth and prevent them from growing. Acacia is also known to remove plaque in the mouth and reduce gingivitis. For this, it is beneficial to chew the fresh bark of an acacia tree and toast it with its twigs. Apart from this, brushing with equal quantities of acacia bark, leaves, flowers and beans, cures diseases of teeth. In addition, it also cleans the teeth and gums and makes them strong.For the treatment of diarrhea-Research on Acacia shows that it has hepatoprotective, cardiovascular, antispasmodic and anti microbial properties. Hence it is used at the time of diarrhea. Grind the leaves of acacia and black cumin and consume it. It provides relief in diarrhea. Apart from this, taking decoction made of acacia bark is beneficial for the treatment of stomach infection or diarrhea.Acacia for the treatment of cough-Acacia is a good option for curing coughs. The medicinal properties found in it cures cough. For this, powder made of acacia leaf and stem bark can be taken with honey.Effective in removing swelling-Acacia has anti-granuloma and anti-inflammatory properties which are helpful in preventing inflammation. Research on Acacia suggests that it helps treat inflammatory diseases. It provides relief to patients with osteoporosis (bone disease). Acacia pods are also used in the treatment of inflammation caused by rheumatoid (inflammatory disorders) and arthritis.Help to get rid of Leucorrhea-If anyone has problems with white water or leucorrhoea, then take 1 teaspoon of acacia bark powder twice a day with cow's milk. Consuming it helps to get rid of these problems. Apart from this, soak the bark of acacia in water overnight and boil it the next day. Boil the water until it is reduced to half. Later filter it and fill it in the bottle. Now washing the vagina with this water provides relief in leucorrhoea and vaginal inflammation.Beneficial in menstrual disorders-Acacia is used to remove various gynecological problems and to treat menstrual disorders in women. It acts as a tonic for the uterine muscles and the endometrium. It is beneficial to drink a decoction of acacia bark in case of excessive bleeding at the time of menstruation. With its use, menstruation will become regular.Strengthens the uterus-In case of problems like infertility, uterine weakness, hormonal imbalance, stomach disease and pelvic pain, consume Acacia pod. In such a situation, a boil emerges in the trunk of an acacia tree, which is called a bandana of acacia. Grind it to make powder and take it from the next day after the end of menstruation, one can get rid of infertility problems.Beneficial in the problem of abnormal vaginal blood-If someone has problems related to blood circulation, abnormal vaginal bleeding, urination, then make a decoction of acacia bark and drink it twice a day. Consuming it will get rid of these problems.For masculine power-Toast 100 grams of Acacia Keekar and mix 500 grams of Ashwagandha in it. Now take one spoon of this mixture regularly for 15 days in the morning and evening. By doing this, you get benefit in premature ejaculation, lack of semen and metal debility. Apart from this, frying gum of acacia in ghee and making it a dish increases the stamina.Beneficial in eye pain and swelling-Grind the leaves of acacia and make its cake, tying it on the eye at night while sleeping, it cures eye pain, burning sensation and redness of the eyes. Apart from this, after grinding acacia leaf, mixing honey and applying this paste in the form of mascara to the eyes ends the problem of watery eyes.Helpful in the treatment of diabetes-Acacia has the ability to balance insulin levels which is very beneficial for the patient of diabetes. Apart from insulin, acacia pods also control glucose levels in the body. Therefore, consuming powder of Acacia pods is good for diabetes.Help in reducing obesity-Acacia is also very effective for reducing weight. Preliminary research suggests that obesity is reduced rapidly by consuming 30 grams of acacia powder daily. Anticancer properties-According to Ayurveda, acacia has sufficient cancer fighting properties. The elements present in it are DNA from cancer cells and also reduce the side effects of chemotherapy.It is helpful in healing the wound-Acacia is a very beneficial medicine for healing wounds because acacia leaves and bark have the ability to control bleeding and infection. Therefore Acacia is used to cure any kind of injury, wound, bleeding and infection. For this, grinded acacia leaves should be applied on the wound. This heals the wound quickly.For anxiety, depression and stress-Acacia glue is used to reduce stress because it has antioxidant properties which help reduce oxidative stress. Oxidative stress is directly related to psychosis. Reduction of oxidative stress helps to reduce many mental diseases and problems like depression, stress and anxiety.For the treatment of hemorrhoids-Acacia pods are a good remedy for the treatment of bloody piles. Acacia has anti-inflammatory properties which helps in reducing the inflammation on any part of the body. Make a powder by grinding the Banda of acacia with black pepper. Now, taking this mixture with water daily is beneficial in piles.Helpful in blood purification-Acacia has the properties of a natural blood purifier which helps in removing impurities (toxins) from the body. Apart from this, immunity can also be boosted by the decoction of acacia bark.Antibacterial, antifungal and antimicrobial properties-Various research conducted on acacia shows that it inhibits the growth of many types of bacteria, pathogenic fungi and parasites.Side effects of AcaciaUse of Acacia in sufficient quantities or as a medicine does not have any detrimental effect on the body. However, excessive use can have the following side effects-It can worsen the amenorrhoea, that is, the problem of not having menstruation.Consumption of acacia in excess can damage the liver and kidneys.Pregnant women should not use Acacia because it can be harmful for them.A patient of heart disease must consult a doctor before taking this herb.

name: THREE ANGELS Black Beans (Njahi) 1kg
product_detail: Dolichos Lablab (Lablab purpureus (L.) commonly known as lablab bean or turtle beans, (locally referred to as njahi) is a legume small species native to Asia. Kenyan black beans ( Njahi), is popular in kenyan households because of the high levels of iron, phosphorous, calcium, magnesium, manganese, copper and zinc in black beans all contribute to building and maintaining bone structure and strength.They are an excellent source of vegetarian protein; good quality protein that can replace “nyama” for those who cannot afford meat.• They are a good source of insoluble fibre. This fibre has several benefits including serving as pre-biotics (food for the healthy bacteria in your gut), as a “filler food” which create a feeling of “fullness” and hence reduce the need to eat extra food.• They cleanse the gut, by serving a bulk forming purgative - through various mechanisms and complement the healing process of inflammatory gut conditions like irritable bowel syndrome, leaky gut and hemorrhoids (bleeding from piles at the extreme end of the rectum).• When absorbed into circulation and metabolized, through various processes, they contribute to reduction of blood pressure and heart health.• The beans also play a key role in blood sugar regulation by slowing down the release of simple sugars. This is because they contain complex carbohydrates and fibre which create a feeling of satiety (fullness) and reduce more intake of sugar.Dolichos have a low glycaemic index and are therefore recommended for diabetics and people, including farmers, who may want to regulate their blood sugar levels.

name: MELBUR Sesame Seed Powder
product_detail: Sesame seeds are tiny, oil-rich seeds that grow in pods on the Sesamum indicum plant. Unhulled seeds have the outer, edible husk intact, while hulled seeds come without the husk. The hull gives the seeds a golden-brown hue. Hulled seeds have an off-white color but turn brown when roasted. Sesame seeds have many potential health benefits and have been used in folk medicine for thousands of years. They may protect against heart disease, diabetes, and arthritis. However, you may need to eat significant amounts — a small handful per day — to gain health benefits.Sesame seed powder is a rich source of natural oils, lignans, antioxidants, protein, dietary fiber, and vitamins and minerals like calcium, iron, potassium, phosphorus, magnesium, B-vitamins, and vitamin E according to the USDA.They are commonly added to salads as a topping for bread and grain products, crackers, sushi, cakes, soups, or as breading for fish and meat. Also, sesame oil, derived from the seeds, is a rich source of nutrients with both laxative and emollient properties.

Cakes, breads and other baked goods need a little more structure with gluten or a binding agent so its best to blend there!

name: WEMA Organic Flax Seeds
product_detail: Flax seeds are loaded with nutrients - proteins, fiber, fatty acids along with essential vitamins and minerals like Thiamine, Copper, Magnesium, Manganese, Phosphorus, Zinc, Selenium, Vitamin B6, Iron, Folate etc. Flax seeds are particularly high in Thiamine, a B vitamin that plays a key role in energy metabolism as well as in cell function.Flax seeds are high fatty acids, they are high in alpha-linolenic acid ALA, a type of  fatty acid that's important for heart health and found primarily in plant foods, and also helps reduce inflammation and prevents cholesterol from being deposited in the heart's blood vessels.Flax seeds help protect Cancer, they are rich in Lignans. Lignans are antioxidants that have been studied for their Potent Cancer Fighting properties. Flax seeds have more Lignans than other plant foods.Flax seeds are rich in fiber, they contain 2 types of fiber, Soluble fiber and insoluble fiber, which get fermented by bacteria in the body intestines to support gut health and improve bowel regularity.Soluble fiber absorbs water in the intestines and slows down digestion which may help regulate blood sugar levels and lower cholesterol.Insoluble fiber adds bulk to the stool, which prevents constipation and promotes regular bowel movement.Flax seeds lower cholesterol levels. Eating flax seeds decreases levels of LDL(bad cholesterol), reducing BMI(Body mass index),  total cholesterol and blood pressure. The fiber in flax seeds binds to  bile salts before being excreted by the body. To replenish these salts, cholesterol is pulled from the blood to the liver, resulting to lower levels.Flax seeds are known for their ability to decrease blood pressure levels. Flax seeds may stabilize blood sugar levels and promote blood sugar control. The fiber in flax seeds slows the absorption of sugar in the blood, which stabilizes and/ or reduces blood sugar levels.Flax seeds help in weight management, because of the high fiber, they reduce feelings of hunger and overall appetites. This is because soluble fiber eases digestion and increases feeling of fullness.To enjoy all these benefits get yourself a pack of these Nutrient and Vitamin packed product.
key_features: Rich in nutrients, fibre and lignans
Lowers risk of heart disease and stroke
Reduces risk of cancer especially breast and prostate

name: MELBUR Cassava Flour (Muhogo)
product_detail: Cassava flour is a gluten-, grain- anf nut-free flour. It comes from the whole cassava root, which is simply peeled, dried and ground. This makes cassava flour different from tapioca flour flour. This also means that cassava flour has more dietary fiber than tapioca flour. Yes, the cassava root contains naturally occurring toxic cyanide compounds (also found in almonds and spinach!) but is only if the cassava is eaten raw. The flour, on the other hand, is safe, does not contain the toxic part and has compounds that can prevent one from getting sickIt is very rich in carbohydrates as it comes from a starchy tuber. For instance, per 100 grams, cassava has double the calories and carbohydrates as sweet potato. Cassava flour is also the most similar to wheat flour of all gluten-free flours, and can be replaced on a 1:1 basis with wheat flour in many recipes. Cassava flour is excellent for cooking amd baking
key_features: Has a lot of uses in the kitchen

name: MELBUR Amaranth Flour (Terere)
product_detail: Amaranth flour is a gluten-free, protein-rich flour. It is produced by grinding seeds from the amaranth plant into a fine powder. Amaranth, delivers high-quality protein and also contains plenty of other healthful nutrients. Amaranth flour has a protein content ranging between 14.5 and 17.8 percent. It also contains high amounts of lysine. Amaranth flour is also rich in fatty acids and includes tocotrienol, a potent form of vitamin E. Amaranth flour has roughly five times the iron and three times the fiber of wheat flour. It’s also rich in other micronutrients, including potassium, phosphorus and, vitamins A and C.Amaranth flour is one of several specialty flours available for use as an ingredient. It can be used to make prorridge and in baking

Canola is an agricultural plant in the kale family, upon maturity the canola pods are harvested and the seeds are cold-pressed to produce one of the healthiest cooking oils – canola oil.Cold-pressed canola oil is gently squeezed from the canola seed by crushing it at temperatures below 40C. This process savours the natural properties of the oil which would otherwise be destroyed through heat and chemicals. name: Flute Ylang-Ylang Oil-Infused Incense Sticks
product_detail: Hand-rolled in  Incense sticks from Flute quality incense manufacturers for many years.  Fragranced with high quality essential oils, each stick you light gives off the aroma you would both hope for and expect.  At the superbly affordable price of only a buck per pack, you can load up on all the scents you love, while venturing into unknown terrain, and finding all your new favorites.USES OF INCENSE STICKS1. Relax and unwindLight some Incense, curl up on the sofa with a cup of tea, a book and some chilled-out music. Alternatively, run a bath and replace candles with an Incense Stick or two. Soft fragrances will further enhance this time, allowing you to give yourself time and space away from the hassles of everyday living. Frankincense, Sandalwood and Cedarwood are all ‘calming fragrances’, so work well for general relaxation.2. Reduce stress and anxietyA step up from relaxing – reduce body activities like heart rate and breathing. Also, encourage your mind to stop worrying and racing from one thing to another. Go for the purest and best quality Sandalwoods for this. Lavender and Rosemary are other great choices here too.3. MeditationIncense is used widely in many religious practices to deepen attention, heighten senses and uplift one’s own spirit when practicing meditation. Traditionally, the passing of time was also measured by the burning of set length incense sticks.Sandalwoods and Lotus are used most frequently for meditation – but you chose what suits you best. One that transports you to the place you need to be, without taking over your thoughts.4. SpiritualityThe burning of Incense can act as a doorway to spirituality, formal or informal, recognised religion or secular. Incense is and has been for thousands of years in daily use in many religions of the world – Hinduism, Buddhism and Christianity.5. Generosity and MindfulnessWhether formal or informal, religious or aesthetic, you create good Karma by taking an incense stick and lighting it as an offering. A simple way to do something, without expectation of return. An act of generosity and letting go.Make this a mindful activity and select an Incense Stick of high-quality. Take time and pride in preparation, selecting your stick, incense bowl and lighting materials. Light, ‘listen’ to the fragrance and relax.6. Stimulate creativityA well-selected fragrance can be used to enhance your own abilities, stimulate ideas and improve mental performance. Aloeswood based Incense is known for this as well as ‘uplifting’ fragrances such as Lemongrass, Citrus scents, Geranium and Ylang-Ylang.7. Increase FocusBurn Aloeswood and uplifting fragrances when working or studying to increase focus and enhance concentration. Less intrusive than having music playing in the background, fragrances have a subtler effect of the mind and body, making them a perfect partner for work, study or engaging in a hobby that requires detailed focus. 8. Aid sleepInsomnia is an increasing affliction, especially in our modern, always on and interrupt orientated society. Lavender is especially associated with an aid to sleep, as are Vetiver and Chamomile. Having an Incense stick burning when falling asleep is far safer than using a candle with its naked flame.9. Increase sexual desireYes! Use fragrances such as Jasmine, Vanilla and Rose to create a ‘get it on’ mood. We stock a very popular Romance Selection box of Luxury Indian Incense by Sacred Elephant for this very purpose. The mind is a powerful thing, readily activated by these aphrodisiac scents. Also, try Cinnamon to drive passion and loving moments.10. Yoga practiceHelp focus the mind and ready the body by creating the right aromatic atmosphere. Doing such a natural and healthy activity you’ll want to avoid anything artificial, toxic or just plain distracting. Try Sacred Elephant's Yoga Selection – 4 fragrances carefully chosen to suit many types and styles of Yoga - from energetic to restful and meditative.11. MedicinalThe effect of good aromas, generated from Incense sticks has been shown to raise serotonin in the brain. As an alternative to taking drugs, nonpharmacological methods of raising brain serotonin may not only improve mood but does so without side-effects or dangers of addiction. Serotonin is considered a natural mood stabilizer and helps with sleeping, eating, and digestion. Serotonin also helps reduce depression, regulate anxiety and reduce headaches.In summary, Serotonin is good and Incense helps it flow! Rose is highest on our list of recommendations for this attribute; try it blended alongside a good Aloeswood stick too.12. Cultivate a new interestSome people drink and appreciate fine wines – others burn Incense! There is an interesting journey to be taken here with fragrance … Which do you like, which motivates you, which affects you most? Turning the burning of Incense into an interest will encourage you to slow down, appreciate things in more detail, even tune up your ability to focus and concentrate. There’s much to discover, learn and appreciate.13. Air purificationCertain floral based ingredients have antibacterial properties – such as the Nag Champas. Plus, Incense is an easy, quick and accessible way to cover unwanted household smells like cooking, pets, damp clothes etc. Cedar, Myrrh and Citrus scents will ‘cleanse’ the air, leaving behind a freshness and new beginning.14. A magical experienceScents arouse significant responses in our brains and can instantly remind us of past events, people and emotions. We can be transported back to ancient Egypt, to Springtime in Japan – or anything within our own memory banks.  Thegood feelings are just a moment away. Accessible in price, easy to use, huge choice plus interesting and engaging.
key_features: Eliminating Mental Fog, Clearing the mind

name: Impact Stinging Nettle Thabai Powder Organic And Pure-100g
product_detail: Stinging nettle is a shrub that comes from northern Europe and Asia. Its scientific name is Urtica dioica. The plant boasts pretty, heart-shaped leaves and yellow or pink flowers, but the stem is covered in tiny, stiff hairs that release stinging chemicals when touched. Stinging nettle has been a staple in herbal medicine since ancient times. Ancient Egyptians used stinging nettle to treat arthritis and lower back pain, while Roman troops rubbed it on themselves to help stay warm. The specific benefits of this herbal product includes the following:BenefitsHas anti-inflammatory properties and therefore effective in managing osteoarthritis, gout, and joint painAlleviate allergies and ease symptoms such as sneezing, nasal congestion, and itchingLowers blood Pressure (antihypertensive)Lowers blood Sugar (anti-diabetic properties)Helps in management of enlarged prostatesSource of important vitamins (e.g Vitamins A, C and K and B vitamins) and minerals (e.g Calcium, iron, magnesium, phosphorus, potassium and sodium)How to Use Stinging Nettle Powder1.     The Stinging Nettle Powder can be steeped to make a healthy  herbal tea by following the procedure below:Add clean water to two spoonful of Stinging Nettle leaves powder.Bring the water to a boil.Let the mixture sit for five minutesPour the mixture through a small strainer.Add a bit of Mynatural honey, cinnamon, or stevia then drink2.     The Stinging Nettle Powder can be added to soups, stews, smoothies and fries when cookingCaution: Avoid eating fresh leaves of Stinging Nettle as they can cause irritation

name: Vacuum Sealer Bags 2 Pcs 28cm X 3mtrs
product_detail: Vacuum bags come with three enclosed sides and are also called barrier bags. Vacuum sealer bags are specifically designed for reduced air permeability to hold and maintain a vacuum within the bag.  Vacuum bag packaging is the most common form of vacuum packaging. Vacuum bags are used in homes and high-volume commercial packaging facilities. Multiple sizes, thicknesses, and types are available to accommodate a variety of products. The most common bag thickness is a three mil thickness or three-thousandths of an inch. The 3 Mil thickness is thick enough to obtain a dependable seal for long-term storage. The type of vacuum sealer being used often determines the kind of bag that can be used. Vacuum sealers with an internal compressor often require channeled vacuum bags due to low vacuum pressure. Channeled vacuum bags are textured with small dimples to allow air to escape the bag. Channeled vacuum bags lack the clarity smooth bags do but provide an excellent vacuum.
key_features: * CERTIFIED FOOD SAFE, BOILABLE, BPA FREE, MICROWAVE & FREEZER - Our rolls go through Internationally recognized testing by SGS to ensure no chemicals will leech into your food.

name: Mama Earth Beetroot Powder- Liver Detoxification, Reduces Blood Pressure, Improves Stamina.
product_detail: Mama Earth Beetroot powder is derived from the root vegetable known as the beet or beetroot Here are some of the benefits associated with Mama Earth’s beetroot powder: Nutrient-richMama Earth Beetroot powder is packed with essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. It is a good source of vitamin C, potassium, iron, magnesium, and folate. These nutrients are important for maintaining overall health and supporting various bodily functions. Blood pressure regulationBeets and beetroot powder are rich in nitrates, which the body converts into nitric oxide. Nitric oxide helps to relax and dilate blood vessels, improving blood flow and reducing blood pressure. Consuming beetroot powder may have a positive impact on cardiovascular health. Enhanced exercise performanceThe nitrate content in beetroot powder has been shown to improve exercise performance. Nitric oxide helps to increase blood flow to muscles, reducing the oxygen cost of exercise and improving stamina. Athletes and individuals engaged in physical activities often use beetroot powder as a natural performance enhancer. Improved enduranceBeetroot powder may boost endurance levels due to its nitrate content. Studies have shown that consuming beetroot juice or beetroot powder before exercise can improve time to exhaustion, allowing individuals to exercise for longer durations. Anti-inflammatory properties:The antioxidants present in beetroot powder, such as betalains, have anti-inflammatory properties. They help to reduce inflammation in the body, which is associated with chronic diseases such as heart disease, diabetes, and certain types of cancer. Detoxification support: Mama Earth Beetroot powder contains compounds that support liver detoxification processes. It helps the liver in breaking down toxins and removing them from the body. This can contribute to overall detoxification and improved liver function. Digestive health Mama Earth Beetroot  powder is a good source of dietary fiber, which aids in digestion and promotes regular bowel movements. It can help prevent constipation and promote a healthy digestive system. Brain health:Some research suggests that beetroot powder may have positive effects on cognitive function and brain health. The nitrates in beets may improve blood flow to the brain, potentially enhancing cognitive performance and reducing the risk of age-related cognitive decline.

name: Flute Musk Sandal Oil-Infused Incense Sticks
product_detail: Hand-rolled in  Incense sticks from Flute quality incense manufacturers for many years.  Fragranced with high quality essential oils, each stick you light gives off the aroma you would both hope for and expect.  At the superbly affordable price of only a buck per pack, you can load up on all the scents you love, while venturing into unknown terrain, and finding all your new favorites.USES OF INCENSE STICKS1. Relax and unwindLight some Incense, curl up on the sofa with a cup of tea, a book and some chilled-out music. Alternatively, run a bath and replace candles with an Incense Stick or two. Soft fragrances will further enhance this time, allowing you to give yourself time and space away from the hassles of everyday living. Frankincense, Sandalwood and Cedarwood are all ‘calming fragrances’, so work well for general relaxation.2. Reduce stress and anxietyA step up from relaxing – reduce body activities like heart rate and breathing. Also, encourage your mind to stop worrying and racing from one thing to another. Go for the purest and best quality Sandalwoods for this. Lavender and Rosemary are other great choices here too.3. MeditationIncense is used widely in many religious practices to deepen attention, heighten senses and uplift one’s own spirit when practicing meditation. Traditionally, the passing of time was also measured by the burning of set length incense sticks.Sandalwoods and Lotus are used most frequently for meditation – but you chose what suits you best. One that transports you to the place you need to be, without taking over your thoughts.4. SpiritualityThe burning of Incense can act as a doorway to spirituality, formal or informal, recognised religion or secular. Incense is and has been for thousands of years in daily use in many religions of the world – Hinduism, Buddhism and Christianity.5. Generosity and MindfulnessWhether formal or informal, religious or aesthetic, you create good Karma by taking an incense stick and lighting it as an offering. A simple way to do something, without expectation of return. An act of generosity and letting go.Make this a mindful activity and select an Incense Stick of high-quality. Take time and pride in preparation, selecting your stick, incense bowl and lighting materials. Light, ‘listen’ to the fragrance and relax.6. Stimulate creativityA well-selected fragrance can be used to enhance your own abilities, stimulate ideas and improve mental performance. Aloeswood based Incense is known for this as well as ‘uplifting’ fragrances such as Lemongrass, Citrus scents, Geranium and Ylang-Ylang.7. Increase FocusBurn Aloeswood and uplifting fragrances when working or studying to increase focus and enhance concentration. Less intrusive than having music playing in the background, fragrances have a subtler effect of the mind and body, making them a perfect partner for work, study or engaging in a hobby that requires detailed focus. 8. Aid sleepInsomnia is an increasing affliction, especially in our modern, always on and interrupt orientated society. Lavender is especially associated with an aid to sleep, as are Vetiver and Chamomile. Having an Incense stick burning when falling asleep is far safer than using a candle with its naked flame.9. Increase sexual desireYes! Use fragrances such as Jasmine, Vanilla and Rose to create a ‘get it on’ mood. We stock a very popular Romance Selection box of Luxury Indian Incense by Sacred Elephant for this very purpose. The mind is a powerful thing, readily activated by these aphrodisiac scents. Also, try Cinnamon to drive passion and loving moments.10. Yoga practiceHelp focus the mind and ready the body by creating the right aromatic atmosphere. Doing such a natural and healthy activity you’ll want to avoid anything artificial, toxic or just plain distracting. Try Sacred Elephant's Yoga Selection – 4 fragrances carefully chosen to suit many types and styles of Yoga - from energetic to restful and meditative.11. MedicinalThe effect of good aromas, generated from Incense sticks has been shown to raise serotonin in the brain. As an alternative to taking drugs, nonpharmacological methods of raising brain serotonin may not only improve mood but does so without side-effects or dangers of addiction. Serotonin is considered a natural mood stabilizer and helps with sleeping, eating, and digestion. Serotonin also helps reduce depression, regulate anxiety and reduce headaches.In summary, Serotonin is good and Incense helps it flow! Rose is highest on our list of recommendations for this attribute; try it blended alongside a good Aloeswood stick too.12. Cultivate a new interestSome people drink and appreciate fine wines – others burn Incense! There is an interesting journey to be taken here with fragrance … Which do you like, which motivates you, which affects you most? Turning the burning of Incense into an interest will encourage you to slow down, appreciate things in more detail, even tune up your ability to focus and concentrate. There’s much to discover, learn and appreciate.13. Air purificationCertain floral based ingredients have antibacterial properties – such as the Nag Champas. Plus, Incense is an easy, quick and accessible way to cover unwanted household smells like cooking, pets, damp clothes etc. Cedar, Myrrh and Citrus scents will ‘cleanse’ the air, leaving behind a freshness and new beginning.14. A magical experienceScents arouse significant responses in our brains and can instantly remind us of past events, people and emotions. We can be transported back to ancient Egypt, to Springtime in Japan – or anything within our own memory banks.  Thegood feelings are just a moment away. Accessible in price, easy to use, huge choice plus interesting and engaging.

name: Ronson Petrol Lighter Fluid Barbeque Roast Starter Cleaning Paint Oil
product_detail: Ideal for all Petrol Lighters only and cleaning fluid for the home, Garage and Studio.Zippo Windproof LightersWhen your windproof lighter is out of fluid, fill your windproof lighter with Ronson lighter fuel. Hold the lighter in one hand. Use the other hand to remove the insert. Fill slowly and never over fill. You can do this by lifting the felt pad to reveal the packing material in the fuel chamber. Saturate the packing with Ronson Lighter Fuel. Stop filling when fuel reaches top of the packing.Zippo Refillable Hand WarmersTo fill your hand warmer with lighter fluid, pour Ronson Lighter Fuel into the appropriate 6 or 12 hour plastic filling cup provided in the package. Then carefully and slowly pour the contents of the filling cup in to the filling hole on the Hand Warmer body, while maintaining the Hand Warmer in an upright position.Zippo Fuel CanisterRefill the fuel canister with Ronson premium lighter fuel when the canister is empty.About RonsonRonson was founded as Art Metal Works in Newark, NJ in 1886 by Louis V. Aronson. The company manufactured various decorative metal wares including bookends, paperweights, desk sets, lamps, miniatures, and other metal crafted items. Due to customer demand, Aronson began to explore the flame market and began manufacturing lighters in the early 1900s.In 1910 Aronson was granted a patent for a spark producing ignition system named the 'Pist-o-liter' and in 1913 manufactured a pocket lighter named the 'Wonderlite'. In 1928, Ronson secured a patent for the revolutionary single-action 'Banjo' lighter, which offered both ignition and extiguishment in a single push. Through the decades Ronson continued to develop several styles of pocket, multi-purpose, and torch style lighters as well as accessories including lighter fluid, butane, and flints.Today, Ronson is a member of the Zippo Manufacturing Company family of brands. Acquired in 2010, Zippo Manufacturing Company acquired substantially all of the assets of Ronson Consumer Products Corporation, Woodbridge, NJ, and Ronson Corporation of Canada Ltd.; and certain related assets of Ronson Corporation. The productline continues to be marketed and sold in the United States and Canada under the Ronson name at retailers.

name: Blue Band With Choco, 500g
product_detail: Blueband Choco spread is a creamy, indulgent spread made primarily from chocolate and other ingredients such as sugar, oils, and additional flavorings. Ingredients: The primary ingredient in chocolate spread is cocoa, which gives it its rich chocolate flavor. Sugar is typically added to sweeten the spread, along with vegetable oils such as to create a smooth, creamy consistency. Additional ingredients may include milk solids, emulsifiers, and flavorings.Texture: Chocolate spread has a smooth, creamy texture that makes it easy to spread onto various foods such as bread, crackers, or fruit. It has a consistency similar to peanut butter but is much smoother and softer due to the addition of oils.Flavor: The flavor of chocolate spread is rich, sweet, and intensely chocolatey, with undertones of any additional flavorings that may be included, such as hazelnut or vanilla. The balance of sweetness and chocolate flavor can vary depending on the brand and recipe.Uses: Chocolate spread is a versatile ingredient that can be used in various ways. It's commonly spread onto bread or toast for a quick and indulgent breakfast or snack. It can also be used as a filling for pastries, crepes, or cakes, or as a topping for pancakes, waffles, or ice cream. Some people even use it as a dip for fruit or pretzels.Varieties: There are many different varieties of chocolate spread available on the market, ranging from classic milk chocolate spreads to dark chocolate spreads and variations that include additional ingredients such as nuts or caramel. Some brands also offer vegan or dairy-free options made with alternative ingredients like coconut oil or almond milk.Packaging: Chocolate spread is typically sold in jars or plastic containers, although single-serve packets or squeezable tubes are also available for convenience. The packaging often features colorful labels and images of chocolate or other ingredients to appeal to consumers.Storage: Chocolate spread should be stored in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Once opened, it's best kept in the refrigerator to maintain its freshness and prevent it from spoiling. However, refrigeration can cause the spread to become firmer, so some people prefer to store it at room temperature for a softer consistency.Overall, chocolate spread is a delicious and indulgent treat that adds a touch of sweetness and chocolate flavor to a variety of foods. Whether enjoyed on its own or used as an ingredient in recipes, it's a beloved pantry staple for chocolate lovers everywhere.

name: Mama Earth Curry Powder- Boosts Immunity
product_detail: Mama Earth Curry powder is incredibly versatile and can be used in a wide variety of dishes.   It is commonly used as a seasoning for curries, stews, and sauces, but it can also be used to flavor rice, vegetables, meat, and seafood dishes.  Here are some of the benefits of Mama Earth Curry Powder:  1.      Anti-inflammatory properties:   Many of the spices in curry powder, such as turmeric, ginger, and cinnamon, have been found to possess anti-inflammatory properties.   Curcumin, the active compound in turmeric, is particularly renowned for its anti-inflammatory effects.  2.      Protects the body from Diseases:  Curry powder contains spices like cumin and coriander, which are rich in antioxidants.   Antioxidants help protect the body against damage caused by harmful free radicals and oxidative stress, which can contribute to chronic diseases and aging.  3.      Aids in Digestion:   Some of the spices in curry powder, including ginger, cumin, and fenugreek, have traditionally been used to support digestion. They may help stimulate digestive enzymes, reduce bloating, and alleviate indigestion.  4.      Potential cancer-fighting properties:   Mama Earth Curry Powder is rich in Curcumin, which has shown promising results in laboratory studies for its ability to inhibit the growth of cancer cells and reduce inflammation associated with cancer development.  5.      Regulates Blood Sugar  Certain spices in curry powder, such as turmeric and cinnamon, may help regulate blood sugar levels. They enhance insulin sensitivity and reduce insulin resistance, which can be beneficial for individuals with diabetes or those at risk of developing the condition.  6.      Heart health support:   Some spices in curry powder, like cinnamon, and cardamom, help lower cholesterol levels, reduce blood pressure, and improve blood vessel function, thereby promoting heart health.  7.      Weight management:   Curry powder contains spices like cayenne pepper and black pepper, which can boost metabolism and aid in weight management.   These spices have thermogenic properties, meaning they can increase calorie burning and fat oxidation.  8.      Enhances brain function:   Some of the spices in this curry powder, such as turmeric and ginger, have been studied for their potential cognitive benefits.   Curcumin, the active compound in turmeric, has been found to have neuroprotective properties and may help improve memory and brain function.  9.      Immune system support:   Many of the spices in curry powder, such as turmeric, ginger, and garlic, have antimicrobial and immune-enhancing properties.   They help strengthen the immune system, fight off infections, and promote overall immune health.  10.   Heartburn relief:   Curry powder contains spices like coriander, cumin, and ginger, which have been traditionally used to alleviate symptoms of heartburn and indigestion.   These spices help soothe the digestive system and reduce acid reflux.

name: Mama Earth Cumin Seeds/Powder (Jeera) - Weight Loss,Digestion Problems
product_detail: What is Mama Earth’s Cumin (Jeera) seeds/powder, and why is it so good for you?Cumin is a spice that packs a healthy punch. It can bolster your immune system, may reduce inflammation, control your blood sugar, and boost your memory.Today, cumin has made its mark in the world of health and wellness with a wide array of benefits. Below, you will find some of the most revered health benefits of this cumin powder.Weight LossCumin may be just the ingredient to consider using to support a sustainable approach to weight loss.Digestive HealthIrritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is a common gastrointestinal disorderSome of the most prevalent symptoms of IBS include bloating, abdominal pain, varying bowel habits, and, for many, a significant challenge with one’s quality of life.A review of research of the spice found that cumin is an efficacious remedy for other digestive issues, including indigestion and flatulence.While cumin enhances the flavor of many favorite dishes and meals, it also may enhance your body’s digestion ability and overall digestion process.Diabetes/Blood SugarCumin is a superfood spice that supports healthy blood sugar, and both treats and can help to prevent type 2 diabetes.Cumin is a potent ingredient to include in your diet if you are looking for ingredients to support the balance and stability of your blood sugar, as well as manage diabetic symptoms and complications.Antibacterial/AntiviralCumin seeds are a great way to stay healthy and strong during the common cold and flu season.Cumin seeds have been tested against some common strains of bacteria and viruses.Lowers Risk of Iron-Deficiency AnemiaCumin is a naturally iron-rich ingredient that will increase the iron potency of your diet.One teaspoon of ground cumin contains 1.4 milligrams of iron.Hence, cumin is a great supplementary source of iron, even when used in small amounts as a seasoning.CholesterolHigh blood cholesterol is known as a major risk factor for heart disease and even heart attack.Cumin is a helpful and supportive ingredient for managing your cholesterol levels.Respiratory SupportCumin seeds have been shown to have anti-inflammatory properties.Respiratory challenges are most often wrought with inflammation within the lung system—including the lungs, the trachea, and the bronchi.Cumin seeds are also, as previously mentioned, antibacterial and antiviral, which ensures that if you have a cough (bacterial or viral), you will be in good hands with cumin.Cancer PreventionResearch shows that cumin exhibits chemoprotective qualities that have been shown to “suppress tumor cell proliferation, including colorectal carcinoma, breast adenocarcinoma, osteosarcoma, ovarian carcinoma, myeloblastic leukemia, and pancreatic carcinoma.”

product_detail: Mama Earth’s Coriander Powder is made from the seeds of the coriander plant, which is an herb belonging to the parsley family.  It offers several potential benefits due to its nutritional profile and bioactive compounds.  Here are some Benefits of Mama Earth Coriander Powder:  1.      Enhances Digestion:  Coriander powder contains compounds that stimulate the production of digestive enzymes, promoting healthy digestion and reducing bloating and discomfort.  It may also help alleviate symptoms of indigestion, such as gas and stomach cramps.  2.      Antioxidant properties:  Coriander powder is rich in antioxidants which help protect against oxidative stress caused by free radicals in the body, which can contribute to chronic diseases and aging.  3.      Blood sugar regulation:   Coriander powder helps improve glucose tolerance and insulin sensitivity, potentially reducing the risk of developing diabetes.  4.      Weight management:  Coriander powder is low in calories and can be used as a flavoring agent in dishes without adding significant calories  5.      Anti-inflammatory effects:   Coriander powder possess anti-inflammatory properties.   It helps reduce inflammation in the body, potentially benefiting conditions like arthritis and inflammatory bowel diseases.  6.      Cholesterol management:   Coriander powder consumption can help reduce LDL (bad) cholesterol and increase HDL (good) cholesterol, promoting a healthier lipid profile.   7.      Diuretic properties:   Coriander powder promotes urine production and help eliminate toxins from the body.   This can support kidney health and may aid in reducing water retention and bloating.  8. name: Mama Earth Organic Flax Seeds-100g,Reduces Cholestrol,Aids In Weight Loss
product_detail: What is Mama Earth’s Flaxseeds and why it’s good for you?  Flaxseeds s are a prized superfood, known for their extensive nutritive values and health benefits  The benefits of flaxseed meal can be seen as soon as you start implementing it in your eating regimen. For instance, your digestive system will hum along nicely.   And there are benefits that serve you over the long term, too, such as improved cholesterol and better heart health.  Many people are unaware of its health benefits. But it's an ideal time to aware people of flax seed benefits.  The seeds contain an appropriate measure of fiber, cancer prevention agents and fatty acids, and are superb for your skin, hair and overall health.  1. Enhances Digestive Health:  Flaxseeds are a rich source of both soluble and insoluble fiber.   The fibers in flaxseeds enhance the intestinal absorption of supplements.  The fiber additionally enhances the movement of food through the digestive organs.  Flaxseed also reduces the feeling of hunger as the solvent fiber breaks down in the water and makes a gel-like substance, keeping the stomach full for a longer period of time. This majorly helps in weight loss.  2. Reduces High Cholesterol:  Research has proposed that eating flaxseeds every day can diminish the cholesterol level remarkably.   It contains fatty acids fiber and lignan, which altogether helps to diminish cholesterol.  3. Controls Diabetes:  Several types of research found that everyday consumption of lignan-rich foods balances out blood sugar levels by enhancing insulin affectability.   This is because of the drop in oxidant stress(imbalance between free radicals and the ability of the body to detoxify their harmful effects through neutralization by antioxidants) caused by its high antioxidant levels.  4. Avoids Cancer:  The antioxidants present in flaxseeds give security from cancer and heart infections.   The lignans and ALA(alpha-linolenic acid) present in flaxseeds have antigenic properties.   They restrict the tumors from spreading or forming new blood cells.   Recent studies have inferred that flaxseeds remarkably bring down the danger of developing breast, prostate and colon cancer.  5. Rich in Omga 3 Fatty Acids:  Flaxseed is among the richest source of high-quality omga 3 fatty acids.  A deficiency of this must want nutrient in the body can cause dry and brittle hair.   On the other hand, a regular intake of flaxseeds may make your hair more strong.  6. They Contain High-Quality Protein:  Flax seeds are an incredible source of plant-based protein, and there's developing enthusiasm for flaxseed protein and its medical advantages.   Flaxseed protein is wealthy in the amino acids arginine, aspartic acid, and glutamic acid.  7. Battles Inflammation:  Deficiency of Omga 3 fatty acid is one of the major reasons for inflammation and intake of Omga 3 can be helpful for battling inflammation in the body.  ALA(alpha-linolenic acid) and lignans found in flaxseeds lessen inflammation in the body by restricting the release of certain inflammatory agents.  8. Controls Acne:  Flaxseeds restrict the generation of sebum, a sticky and oily substance produced by the glands present near the skin, keeping acne out of the way.   Intake of 1 to 2 tablespoons of flaxseed daily can control acne remarkably.  9. Decreases Dandruff:  Flaxseed controls the production of sebum in the scalp, avoiding dandruff.   The anti-inflammatory properties of flaxseeds also control the presence of dandruff, eczema, and other hair problems.  10. Prevents Male Baldness:  The ALA(alpha-linolenic acid) in flaxseeds exhibits a chemical that changes over teststerone into Dihydroteststerone (DHT).   DHT restraint the hair follicles, that leads to baldness. The ALA and oleic acid in flaxseeds are utilized as regular solutions for treat male hair loss.  11. Locks Moisture:  Dry skin can prompt a few skin conditions like eczema, psoriasis and skin aging.The essential omga 3 fatty acids present in flaxseed keeps the skin hydrated and moisturized.  Regular consumption of flaxseeds expands the body's natural oil generation, keeping the skin hydrated and baby soft.   The right way to eat flaxseeds   Flaxseeds have a mild nutty nutty flavour.   It is easy to incorporate these seeds into your diet. You can add them to your salad or smoothies.   But to take maximum benefits of the tiny seeds it is important to have them in the right way  Also, one should not consume more than a tablespoon of flaxseeds in a day.  Who should not consume flaxseeds?  Flaxseeds are generally safe for consumption by most people.   But people suffering from low blood pressure, low blood sugar level, constipation, diarrhoea, hormonal issues and the bleeding problems should be careful before including these seeds in their diet.   Tiny brown seeds are good for pregnant and breastfeeding women, but they should avoid flaxseeds supplements.   In case of any complication or allergy contact your doctor immediately.

All together, this shows that prebiotics can help you lose weight by regulating your appetite, improving mood and mental health, and increasing energy and efficiency. 8. Baobab powder is low glycemicIt’s a good idea to pay attention to your blood sugar even if you are not  diabetic, Maintaining stable blood sugar levels throughout the day helps keep your energy up, your brain healthy, and your mood balanced. 9. Supports gut healthYour digestive system is home to trillions of microorganisms that, when in balance, work to digest food properly and support other bodily systems.Prebiotic fiber acts as food for the good bacteria in your gut, which helps keep the whole microbiome balanced. Promotes glowing skinNot only is a balanced gut microbiome good for your digestion, it’s also great for your skin thanks to the gut-skin axis.Mama Earth’s baobab powder’s  high vitamin C content also helps increase collagen and elastin production, the proteins that keep your skin supple and youthful.Add in baobab powder’s incredible antioxidants that help fight oxidative damage, and you’ve got one of the best foods for glowing skin! 11.Immune boosting powerhouseDid you know that 70% of your immune system is housed in your gut?This means that gut microbiome balance is extremely important for maintaining a healthy immune system.Mama Earth’s baobab powder, with its arsenal of potent nutrients, is an excellent immune booster; Its prebiotic fiber helps balance the gut microbiome while its high levels of vitamin C ensure your immune system can do its job. 12. name: Mama Earth Red Chilli Powder - Improves Heart,Eye Health, Skin & Hair
product_detail: What is Mama Earth’s Red Chilli powder and why its good for you?Chili peppers are the fruits of Capsicum pepper plants, notable for their hot flavor.Chili peppers are primarily used as a spice and can be cooked or dried and powdered. Powdered, red chili peppers are known as paprika.Capsaicin is the main bioactive plant compound in chili peppers, responsible for their unique, pungent taste and many of their health benefits.Here are the health benefits of Mama Earth’s Red Chilli powder: 1. Helps In DigestionRed chillie powder improve the secretion of gastric juices, accelerating digestion and relieving issues like constipation and gas.It also reduces harmful bacteria in your gut, keeping intestines healthy.2. Maintains Blood Pressure LevelsRed chillies are high in potassium, and so is their powder.Potassium relaxes the blood vessels in your body and helps maintain blood pressure levels.They also have capsaicin, an active component which reduces blood pressure and improves circulation.3. Anti-inflammatoryThe capsaicin found in red chilli powder also has anti-inflammatory properties, which means that it reduces inflammation and pain, particularly in muscles and joints.4. Helps in Weight LossIt is common knowledge that red chilli powder aids in weight loss.Once again we have the capsaicin in red chillies to thank for this, as it reduces appetite and accelerates fat burning by increasing the body’s metabolism.5. Improves Cognitive FunctionRed chilli powder has iron, which increases haemoglobin production and increases blood flow.This in turn helps the brain work optimally, improving learning, thinking, reasoning, remembering, problem-solving, decision making, and attention.6. Improves Heart HealthThe wonder component capsaicin found in red chillies also reduces triglycerides, cholesterol and platelet aggregation in the blood, which contributes in improves heart health.It also prevents the formation of blood clots, which is again a plus for heart health.7. Helps in Nasal CongestionRed chilli powder can thin the mucus formed in the nasal passages when you have a cold, which helps in clearing it out.This is why doctors and physicians advise eating spicy foods and drinking soups with red chilli powder in them when you have a cold.8. Builds Immunity And Fights DiseasesRed chilli powder has significant amounts of vitamin C, which strengthens the immune system and helps your body fight infections and diseases.It also helps reduce free radicals in the body and is also known to reduce the chances of cancer.9. Improves Eye HealthOne teaspoon of red chilli powder has 9% of your RDA (requisite daily amount) of vitamin A in it, which is known to improve eyesight and prevent eye diseases such as night blindness.10. Improves Skin and HairHealthy skin requires both vitamin C for collagen production, which is an essential protein that skin and hair have, as well as vitamin A, which keeps hair moisturized and in good condition.Red chilli powder has both, in addition to vitamin E, which is an antioxidant known for its benefits for skin and hair.

name: Mama Earth Red Chilli Powder - Improves Heart,Eye Health, Skin & Hair
product_detail: What is Mama Earth’s Red Chilli powder and why its good for you?  Chili peppers are the fruits of Capsicum pepper plants, notable for their hot flavor.  Chili peppers are primarily used as a spice and can be cooked or dried and powdered. Powdered, red chili peppers are known as paprika.  Capsaicin is the main bioactive plant compound in chili peppers, responsible for their unique, pungent taste and many of their health benefits.  Here are the health benefits of Mama Earth’s Red Chilli powder:   1. Helps In Digestion  Red chillie powder improve the secretion of gastric juices, accelerating digestion and relieving issues like constipation and gas.   It also reduces harmful bacteria in your gut, keeping intestines healthy.   2. Maintains Blood Pressure Levels  Red chillies are high in potassium, and so is their powder.   Potassium relaxes the blood vessels in your body and helps maintain blood pressure levels.   They also have capsaicin, an active component which reduces blood pressure and improves circulation.   3. Anti-inflammatory  The capsaicin found in red chilli powder also has anti-inflammatory properties, which means that it reduces inflammation and pain, particularly in muscles and joints.  4. Helps in Weight Loss  It is common knowledge that red chilli powder aids in weight loss.   Once again we have the capsaicin in red chillies to thank for this, as it reduces appetite and accelerates fat burning by increasing the body’s metabolism.  5. Improves Cognitive Function  Red chilli powder has iron, which increases haemoglobin production and increases blood flow.   This in turn helps the brain work optimally, improving learning, thinking, reasoning, remembering, problem-solving, decision making, and attention.  6. Improves Heart Health  The wonder component capsaicin found in red chillies also reduces triglycerides, cholesterol and platelet aggregation in the blood, which contributes in improves heart health.   It also prevents the formation of blood clots, which is again a plus for heart health.  7. Helps in Nasal Congestion  Red chilli powder can thin the mucus formed in the nasal passages when you have a cold, which helps in clearing it out.   This is why doctors and physicians advise eating spicy foods and drinking soups with red chilli powder in them when you have a cold.  8. Builds Immunity And Fights Diseases  Red chilli powder has significant amounts of vitamin C, which strengthens the immune system and helps your body fight infections and diseases.   It also helps reduce free radicals in the body and is also known to reduce the chances of cancer.  9. Improves Eye Health  One teaspoon of red chilli powder has 9% of your RDA (requisite daily amount) of vitamin A in it, which is known to improve eyesight and prevent eye diseases such as night blindness.  10. Improves Skin and Hair  Healthy skin requires both vitamin C for collagen production, which is an essential protein that skin and hair have, as well as vitamin A, which keeps hair moisturized and in good condition.   Red chilli powder has both, in addition to vitamin E, which is an antioxidant known for its benefits for skin and hair.

name: Mama Earth Ginger Powder- Aids In Digestion, Adds Flavor
product_detail: Mama Earth’s Ginger powder is a spice derived from dried ginger root.It is a popular and widely used ingredient in various cuisines around the world, known for its distinct flavor and medicinal properties.Here are some Benefits and uses of Mama Earth’s Ginger powder:1.      Aids In Digestion:Mama Earth’s Ginger Powder helps stimulate the production of digestive juices and enzymes, promoting better digestion.It eases digestive discomfort, including indigestion, bloating, and gas.2.      Reduces Inflammations:Ginger contains compounds like gingerol, which possess potent anti-inflammatory effects.Regular consumption of ginger helps reduce inflammation in the body and alleviate symptoms of inflammatory conditions.3.      Improves Brain Health:The bioactive compounds in ginger have neuroprotective effects, potentially contributing to improved cognitive function and reducing the risk of age-related cognitive decline.4.      Lowers Blood Pressure:Mama Earth’s ginger powder helps lower blood pressure levels, contributing to better cardiovascular health.5.      Antimicrobial Properties:Ginger contains compounds with antimicrobial properties, which help inhibit the growth of certain bacteria and viruses.6.      Cancer Prevention:Ginger has anti-cancer properties, and its active compounds help prevent the growth and spread of cancer cells.7.      Immune System Support:Ginger contains antioxidants that can help strengthen the immune system, making it better equipped to fight off infections.8.      Fights Acne:Ginger is used to combat skin issues like acne and inflammation due to its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties.9.      Weight Management:Ginger may aid in weight management by boosting metabolism and reducing appetite.10.   Pain Relief:The anti-inflammatory properties of ginger provide relief from certain types of pain, such as arthritis pain, muscle pain and menstrual pain.11.   Enhances Respiratory Health:Ginger's anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties may be helpful in relieving respiratory conditions such as bronchitis and asthma.How To UseIn cooking, you can add ginger powder to spice blends, marinades, curries, soups, stir-fries, and baked goods. It provides a warm and slightly spicy flavor to dishes.To make ginger tea, simply mix a teaspoon of ginger powder with hot water, and you can add honey or lemon for added taste and benefits.You can also sprinkle ginger powder on fruits, smoothies, and salads for a zesty kick.

name: Mama Earth Wheatgrass Powder- Boosts Immunity, Improves Digestion
product_detail: Mama Earth’s Wheatgrass powder is often promoted for its potential health benefits.  Here are some Benefits of Mama Earth’s Wheatgrass Powder:  1.      Rich in nutrients:   Wheatgrass is known to be a concentrated source of several nutrients, including vitamins A, C, E, and K, as well as minerals like iron, calcium, magnesium, and potassium.   It also contains amino acids, enzymes, and chlorophyll.  2.      Boosts Energy Levels:   Wheatgrass is often associated with increased energy levels and improved vitality.   This is due to its nutrient content and potential ability to support overall wellness.  3.      Improves Digestion:  Wheatgrass is believed to have properties that support healthy digestion.  It also helps cleanse the digestive system, promote regular bowel movements, and support gut health.  4.      Enhances Immune system:   The antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals present in wheatgrass help strengthen the immune system and support overall immune function.  5.      Helps in Detoxification:   Mama Earth’s Wheatgrass Powder aids in detoxifying the body by helping to eliminate toxins and heavy metals.   6.      Antioxidant properties:   Wheatgrass contains various antioxidants that help neutralize harmful free radicals in the body. Antioxidants can contribute to overall health and may help protect against certain chronic diseases.  7.      Aids in Weight management:   Wheatgrass powder aids in weight loss or weight management.  It is low in calories and high in fiber, which may help promote feelings of fullness and support healthy digestion.  8.      Improves Blood health:   Wheatgrass is believed to have properties that support healthy blood circulation and oxygenation.   It contains chlorophyll, which is structurally similar to hemoglobin and may assist in improving red blood cell count and function.  9.      Fights Cancer infection:   It contains certain compounds that may help inhibit the growth of cancer cells and protect against certain types of cancer.    10.   Enhances Oral health:   Wheatgrass powder has been used in mouthwashes and dental care products due to its potential antibacterial properties.   It helps reduce oral bacteria and improve overall oral health.     How to Use    Stir a small amount of wheatgrass powder into a glass of water or any other beverage, such as coconut water or herbal tea. Again, adjust the quantity to suit your taste preferences.  Wheatgrass powder can also be used as an ingredient in various recipes. You can add it to homemade energy bars, raw desserts, salad dressings, or sprinkle it on top of soups and salads to enhance the nutritional content  Also, you can add a tablespoon of wheatgrass powder to your favorite smoothie recipe. Blend it along with other fruits, vegetables, and liquids for a nutritious and refreshing smoothie.

name: Naturalli ALL WHEAT GERM 250GM
product_detail: NATURALLI ALL WHEAT GERM 250GMSource of vegetable proteinsGood source of minerals – folate,magnesium, phosphorus, potassium, thiamin and zincWheat germ is part of a wheat kernel and is responsible for helping the plant reproduce and spawn new wheat. Although it’s removed from most processed wheat products, it is a major nutritional component of whole grain wheat.Wheat germ, along with the husk, is removed from refined wheat products — like those that use white flour — so that they can be stored for longer.Wheat germ is added to some granolas, cereals, and cornbread, and it’s also available raw. It is a popular topping for fruit pies, yogurt, ice cream, and hot or cold cereal. It can be a healthier alternative to breadcrumbs in meatballs, meatloaf, and breading for meats.Wheat germ is also available in liquid and gelcap form. It can be used as a food additive or as a nutritional supplement.

name: Mama Earth Fennel Seeds Powder- Boosts Immunity, Aids In Digestion
product_detail: Mama Earth’s Fennel seeds powder is a spice obtained by grinding fennel seeds into a fine powder.  Here are some of the benefits of Mama Earth’s Fennel Seeds Powder:  1.      Enhances Digestion:   Fennel powder is known for its carminative properties, which means it helps relieve gas and bloating.   It aids in digestion by relaxing the gastrointestinal tract muscles, reducing inflammation, and promoting the expulsion of gas from the digestive system.  2.      Improves Respiratory Health:   Fennel powder has been traditionally used to alleviate respiratory issues such as coughs and bronchitis due to its expectorant properties, which can help loosen mucus and ease breathing.  3.      Boosts Immunity:   Fennel powder contains vitamin C, which is known to boost the immune system and help the body defend against infections and illnesses.  4.      Improves Brain Function:   Fennel powder contains potassium, which supports proper brain function, nerve transmission, and cognitive abilities.  5.      Freshen Breathe:   Using fennel powder as a mouth freshener helps combat bad breath and improve oral hygiene.  6.      Supports Heart Health:   Fennel consumption helps lower blood pressure and cholesterol levels.  These effects may contribute to improved heart health and a reduced risk of cardiovascular diseases.  7.      Prevents Cancer:   Mama Earth’s Fennel powder contains certain compounds with anti-cancer properties, such as anethole and flavonoids.   These compounds have shown promise in inhibiting the growth of certain cancer cells.  8.      Regulates Blood Sugar Levels:   Fennel helps regulate blood sugar levels, which could be beneficial for individuals with diabetes or those at risk of developing the condition.   9.      Enhances Eye Health:   Fennel powder contains antioxidants like beta-carotene, lutein, and zeaxanthin.   These compounds are beneficial for maintaining healthy vision and protecting the eyes from age-related macular degeneration and cataracts.  10.   Aids in Hormonal Balance:   Fennel has been used traditionally to support women's health and hormonal balance.   It helps alleviate symptoms of premenstrual syndrome (PMS) and menopause due to its phytoestrogen content.  11.   Anti-inflammatory Effects:   Mama Earth’s Fennel powder contains compounds with anti-inflammatory properties, such as anethole and quercetin.   These compounds help reduce inflammation and potentially alleviate symptoms of inflammatory conditions.    How To Use Mama Earth’s Fennel seeds Powder:  In Soups and Stews:   Use a pinch of fennel powder in soups, stews, and broths to enhance the taste and aroma.  Salad Dressings:   Add a pinch of fennel powder to homemade salad dressings for an interesting twist.

name: Naturalli ALL WHEAT BRAN 250GM
product_detail: NATURALLI ALL WHEAT BRAN 250GMWheat bran, a by-product of the dry milling of common wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) into flour, is one of the major agro-industrial by-products used in animal feeding. It consists of the outer layers (cuticle, pericarp and seedcoat) combined with small amounts of starchy endosperm of the wheat kernel. Other wheat processing industries that include a bran removal step may also produce wheat bran as a separate by-product: pasta and semolina production from durum wheat (Triticum durum Desf.), starch production and ethanol production.Wheat is a plant. The outer shell of the grain (the bran) is used to make medicine.Wheat bran is used as a source of dietary fiber for preventing colon diseases (including cancer), stomach cancer, breast cancer, gallbladder disease, hemorrhoids and hiatal hernia. It is also used for treating constipation, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), high cholesterol, high blood pressure, and type 2 diabetes.How does it work?Wheat bran helps constipation by speeding up the colon and increasing stool output and bowel frequency.
key_features: Constipation. Taking wheat bran seems to be effective for treating mild constipation and restoring normal bowel function, but it doesn't seem to soften stools.
Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS). Taking wheat bran may reduce stomach pain and improve bowel function in people with mild to moderate IBS. However, it may not be as effective as guar gum.
Lowering blood pressure. Taking wheat bran seems to produce modest, but significant reductions in blood pressure.

Preventing cancer of the colon (bowels) or rectum. Several large well-designed studies showed that fiber, including wheat-bran fiber, does not prevent the recurrence of pre-cancerous tumors, despite earlier evidence that suggested fiber might help.

Type 2 diabetes. Taking wheat bran does not seem to consistently improve blood sugar control. Also, it does not improve blood pressure, blood fats, clotting factors, homocysteine, C-reactive protein, or other factors associated with heart disease in patients with type 2 diabetes.
