name: Mama Earth Flaxseeds Powder- Enhances Heart Health, Rich In Nutrients
product_detail: Mama Earth’s Flaxseed powder refers to  flax seeds that have been finely ground into a powder form. Like whole flax seeds, flaxseed powder is a popular and nutritious addition to a balanced diet due to its abundance of health benefits.Here are Some Benefits of Flax Seeds Powder:1.      Rich in Nutrients:Flax seeds are packed with essential nutrients, including omega-3 fatty acids, dietary fiber, protein, vitamins (such as B vitamins), and minerals (such as magnesium, phosphorus, and manganese).2.      Enhances Culinary Uses:Mama Earth’s Flaxseed powder can be incorporated into a wide range of recipes seamlessly.It can be used as an ingredient in baked goods like muffins, cookies, and bread, or sprinkled over cereals, salads, and yogurt.3.      Rich in Omega-3 Fatty Acids:Flaxseed powder is an excellent plant-based source of alpha-linolenic acid (ALA), an essential omega-3 fatty acid that supports heart health, brain function, and reduces inflammation.4.      Rich in Dietary Fiber:Flax seeds are high in soluble and insoluble fiber.This fiber aids digestion, helps maintain bowel regularity, and can contribute to a feeling of fullness, which may assist in weight management.5.      Enhances Heart Health:The omega-3 fatty acids and lignans in flaxseed powder may help lower LDL cholesterol levels, reduce blood pressure, and decrease the risk of cardiovascular diseases.6.      Enhances Digestion:The high fiber content of flaxseed powder aids digestion, promotes regular bowel movements, and supports gut health.7.      Regulates Blood Sugar:Flaxseed powder helps stabilize blood sugar levels, due to the fiber in it.This is mostly beneficial for individuals with type 2 diabetes or those at risk of developing the condition.8.      Reduces Inflammations:The omega-3 fatty acids in flaxseed powder have anti-inflammatory properties that can help alleviate inflammation associated with certain health conditions.9.      Improves Bone Health:Flaxseed powder contains essential minerals like magnesium, phosphorus, and calcium, which contribute to bone health and may reduce the risk of osteoporosis.10.   Aids in Hormonal Balance:The lignans in flaxseed powder have phytoestrogenic properties, which help balance hormones in some individuals.11.   Fights Cancer:The lignans and other compounds in flaxseed powder may have potential anti-cancer properties, particularly for breast, prostate, and colon cancers.12.   Aids in Weight Management:The fiber and healthy fats in flaxseed powder can help you feel fuller for longer, potentially reducing overall calorie intake and supporting weight management efforts.How to Use Mama earth’s Flaxseeds Powder:In Smoothies: Add a tablespoon of flaxseed powder to your favorite smoothie recipes. It will blend seamlessly with fruits, vegetables, and other ingredients, providing a nutritional boost.Soups and Stews:Stir in flaxseed powder while cooking soups or stews. It will thicken the broth slightly and add extra fiber and nutrients to the dish.

name: Clove Pure Clove Bud Oil Mafuta Ya Karafuu Ayurvedic
product_detail: Clove essential oil, steam distilled from the buds of the clove plant, is a popular essential oil that has a history of use by Greek and Roman civilizations, as well as traditional Chinese and Indian medicine.This oil has a powerful warm and spicy scent with anti-microbial, anti-fungal and anesthetic properties. It is most popular for its ability to soothe toothache and improve bad breath and oral health. The chemical compound eugenol is the active ingredient in clove oil that may be responsible for its ability to treat infections and reduce pain.Clove oil is also an effective decongestant and may relieve allergies, sinusitis, colds, coughs and flu.Directions for useClove oil is strong and may burn the skin if you used in a concentrated form, so always dilute it with a carrier oil before external use. Use 2-3 drops of diluted oil to treat fungal skin infections or rub it onto your chest to open up the airways.To treat dental infections and tooth ache, use 2 drops of diluted clove oil onto a cotton ball and press it against the area for 10 minutes.You can also add 3 drops of clove oil to a cup of warm water and use this as a gargle for sore throats, pain, infections and bad breath.Add 2-3 drops to an oil diffuser and inhale the aroma to clear congestion and loosen phlegm.
key_features: Clove essential oil, steam distilled from the buds of the clove plant, is a popular essential oil that has a history of use by Greek and Roman civilizations, as well as traditional Chinese and Indian medicine.

This oil has a powerful warm and spicy scent with anti-microbial, anti-fungal and anesthetic properties. It is most popular for its ability to soothe toothache and improve bad breath and oral health. Clove oil is also an effective decongestant and may relieve allergies, sinusitis, colds, coughs and flu.

Add 2-3 drops to an oil diffuser and inhale the aroma to clear congestion and loosen phlegm.

It is a good source of vitamin C, potassium, iron, magnesium, and folate. These nutrients are important for maintaining overall health and supporting various bodily functions. Blood pressure regulationBeets and beetroot powder are rich in nitrates, which the body converts into nitric oxide. Nitric oxide helps to relax and dilate blood vessels, improving blood flow and reducing blood pressure. Consuming beetroot powder may have a positive impact on cardiovascular health. Enhanced exercise performanceThe nitrate content in beetroot powder has been shown to improve exercise performance. Nitric oxide helps to increase blood flow to muscles, reducing the oxygen cost of exercise and improving stamina. Athletes and individuals engaged in physical activities often use beetroot powder as a natural performance enhancer. Improved enduranceBeetroot powder may boost endurance levels due to its nitrate content. Studies have shown that consuming beetroot juice or beetroot powder before exercise can improve time to exhaustion, allowing individuals to exercise for longer durations. Anti-inflammatory properties:The antioxidants present in beetroot powder, such as betalains, have anti-inflammatory properties. They help to reduce inflammation in the body, which is associated with chronic diseases such as heart disease, diabetes, and certain types of cancer. Detoxification support: Mama Earth Beetroot powder contains compounds that support liver detoxification processes. It helps the liver in breaking down toxins and removing them from the body. This can contribute to overall detoxification and improved liver function. Digestive health Mama Earth Beetroot  powder is a good source of dietary fiber, which aids in digestion and promotes regular bowel movements. It can help prevent constipation and promote a healthy digestive system. Brain health:Some research suggests that beetroot powder may have positive effects on cognitive function and brain health. The nitrates in beets may improve blood flow to the brain, potentially enhancing cognitive performance and reducing the risk of age-related cognitive decline.

name: Mama Earth Lemon Grass Powder- Enhances Digestion
product_detail: Mama Earth’s Lemongrass powder is a dried and powdered form of the lemongrass plant. It believed to possess several health benefits  Here are Some benefits of Mama Earth’s Lemongrass powder:  1.      Aids in Digestion:   Traditionally, lemongrass has been used to support healthy digestion.   It helps relieve stomach discomfort, bloating, and indigestion.   Its consumption as a tea or inclusion in dishes can promote digestive health.  2.       Helps in Detoxification:   Lemongrass is believed to possess detoxifying properties and may assist in eliminating toxins from the body.   It is often used in herbal teas or detoxifying blends to promote overall wellness.  3.      Anti-inflammatory effects:   Mama Earth’s Lemongrass powder helps reduce inflammation in the body and potentially alleviate symptoms associated with inflammation-related conditions.  4.       Has Antimicrobial properties:   Lemongrass contains citral, which have antimicrobial properties.   This inhibits the growth of certain bacteria and fungi, potentially aiding in preventing infections.  5.      Anxiety and stress relief:   The aroma of lemongrass is often associated with relaxation and stress relief.   In aromatherapy, it is used to promote calmness and reduce anxiety.  6.      Fights Cancer Infection:   Certain compounds in lemongrass, such as citral, have shown potential in inhibiting the growth of cancer cells  7.      Regulates Blood sugar:   Lemongrass helps regulate blood sugar levels.  It has a positive impact on individuals with diabetes or those at risk of developing the condition.  8.       Pain relief:   Lemongrass possesses analgesic properties and may help alleviate pain, including headaches, joint pain, and muscle aches.   9.      Reduces Fever:   Lemongrass has been traditionally used to lower fever.   It is believed to possess antipyretic properties that help reduce body temperature.  10      Antioxidant activity:   Lemongrass contains antioxidants that can help protect the body against oxidative stress and damage caused by free radicals.   Antioxidants are beneficial for overall health and may help reduce the risk of chronic diseases.    How To Use;  Soups and stews:   Add lemongrass powder to soups, broths, or stews for its distinct flavor. It works well in Asian-inspired soups, such as Tom Yum or coconut curry soups.  Seasoning:   Sprinkle lemongrass powder as a seasoning on meats, fish, poultry, or vegetables before cooking. It adds a bright and tangy flavor to your dishes. You can use it alone or combine it with other spices and herbs to create a flavorful blend.  Marinades:   Mix lemongrass powder with other marinade ingredients such as soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and lime juice to infuse meats or tofu with its citrusy flavor. Let the ingredients marinate together for at least a few hours before cooking.

name: Coopers Bamako 700WG Insecticide 5gm
product_detail: BAMAKO 700WG is a systemic insecticide for the control of sucking insects in ornamentals and vegetables BAMAKO 700WG is a highly concentrated water dispersible granule formulation that is easy to handle and measure. Because of its superior formulation, Its granules offer the farmers a near dust –free granule that has good flow, rapid wettability and good dispersibilityMODE OF ACTIONThe mode of action of Imidacloprid is based on interference with the transmission of impulses in the nervous system of insects. BAMAKO 700WG acts as an acute contact and stomach poison. It exhibits systemic properties and long residual activity. In addition, BAMAKO 700WG offers the plant a boosting effect leading to stress tolerance resulting in higher crop yield.Re-entry interval: As a general rule, treated areas should not be entered before spray deposits on plant surface dried, unless protective clothing is worn.APPLICATIONAfter soil application via irrigation system or drench, the active ingredient Imidacloprid is taken up by roots and transported to the aerial parts of the plants (stems and leaves) by the sap flow. BAMAKO 700WG protects the root and foliage from pests for several weeks. BAMAKO 700WG offers good residual efficacy as a foliar application too. BAMAKO 700WG is absorbed into the leaf surface and moves within the leaf from upper to the lower surface and towards the tip of the leaf.Mixing: – Half fill the spray or mixing tank with clean water. Add the required quantity ofMixing: – Half fill the spray or mixing tank with clean water. Add the required quantity of BAMAKO 700WG into the tank with agitation system in operation and then top up water to the required level.PUBLIC HEALTH: For public health purposes (cockroaches, bedbugs, flies etc.) You mix the whole sachet in 1 ltr of water
key_features: Broad Spectrum for control of sucking pests: aphids, whiteflies, thrips, scales, mealybugs, garden termites etc
Flexible application method: foliar, drip or drench

Active IngredientLambda-cyhalothrin  Lambda-cyhalothrin Mode of ActionIt is in Chemical family Pyrethroid and affects an organisms’ nervous system. It disintegrates the gating mechanism of sodium channels that are very vital for nerve impulse generation and conduct. Pyrethroids delay the process of closing the sodium channel activation gates keeping them open for too long. This results to delayed excitation of an insects’ nerve fibers causing rapid paralysis and death of the insect upon ingestion or external exposure.Target PestsFliesMosquitosFleasSpidersAntsTicksRate of ApplicationLambda-cyhalothrin release rate of the capsule stays optimized in order to boost insect pick up and residual efficacy. Therefore, small rates as low as one capsule for one mosquito are required.Important Reasons Why Icon 10SC is Your First Choice InsecticideIt has a long-term residue effect of close to 12 months.
